author: Thidawan Tunya
title: 2015 W Taipei Fashion Next Award Winner Announced
text:
Email 
W Taipei stepped up partnership with “Fashion In Taipei + ELLE Next Talent” up-and-coming fashion designer awards and co-held the fabulous fashion show of the top 10 Taiwan designers, the award ceremony, and the after party hosted by W Taipei Music Curator Sona Eyambe at Mega room on level 8 of W Taipei, the most fashionable venue in the city, on August 25 th , 2015. More than 300 invited trendy and hip guests joined this event, including Taipei City Mayor Mr. Koh, the editors/judges by ELLE, the celebrities, models, and fashionista, to witness the birth of the most shining star in fashion. In the end of party, the hotel announced the first-ever winner of “ 2015 W Taipei Fashion Next Award ” – Fabrizio Wang and his fashion brand Jean Pierre Maréchal’s collection will be carried at W Taipei’s W Hotels The store on level 10 and featured on the hotel’s social media. In the future, this raising star will be seen globally through W Hotels Worldwide’s platform and channels. 
“Fashion is the stylish synonym of W Hotels.” shared W Taipei Hotel Manager Taieb TJ Joulak. “W Taipei is always looking for the emerging talents from Taiwan in music, design, and fashion. The partnership with Fashion In Taipei + ELLE Next Talent has shown that we share the same passion for fashion.” 
This year “Fashion In Taipei + ELLE Next Talent” was organized by ELLE Taiwan and Taipei City Office of Commerce to integrate both parties’ source and to promote the up-and-coming fashion talents from Taiwan. The top 10 designers whose ages are from 21 to 61 years old showcased 10 different attitudes in style. Among them, the winner Fabrizio Wang stood out with his men’s voyage collection. “Seize the moment, enjoy life and surpass my limits” is his attitude and he brought a relaxing summer vocation vibe to his runway show. The highlight was the simple and neat casual detachable windbreaker which can be converted into a hidden cross-body bag for trendy travelers. This key piece echoed the attitude of enjoying the easy yet fashionable life. The designer also won several local and international fashion design awards, including the 3rd Prize of 2015 Mercedes Benz China Fashion Week – International Menswear Competition. In Sep., 2015, he will go to Italy to finish his master’s degree and pursuit his dream in the kingdom of fashion.
